import React,{useRef,useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Camera}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SkinToneAnalyzer=()=>{const videoRef=useRef(null);const canvasRef=useRef(null);const[analysis,setAnalysis]=useState(null);const[isAnalyzing,setIsAnalyzing]=useState(false);// Initialize webcam
useEffect(()=>{const startVideo=async()=>{try{const stream=await navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia({video:{width:640,height:480,facingMode:'user'// This ensures we use the front camera on mobile devices
}});if(videoRef.current){videoRef.current.srcObject=stream;}}catch(err){console.error("Error accessing webcam:",err);}};startVideo();},[]);const analyzeSkinTone=()=>{setIsAnalyzing(true);const video=videoRef.current;const canvas=canvasRef.current;const context=canvas.getContext('2d');// Save the current context state
context.save();// Mirror the canvas context
context.scale(-1,1);context.translate(-canvas.width,0);// Draw the mirrored frame
context.drawImage(video,0,0,canvas.width,canvas.height);// Restore the context to its original state
context.restore();// Get image data from the center
const imageData=context.getImageData(canvas.width/2-50,canvas.height/2-50,100,100);// Calculate average RGB values from sampled area
let r=0,g=0,b=0;for(let i=0;i<imageData.data.length;i+=4){r+=imageData.data[i];g+=imageData.data[i+1];b+=imageData.data[i+2];}const pixels=imageData.data.length/4;r=r/pixels;g=g/pixels;b=b/pixels;// Convert RGB to Lab
let rgb=[r/255,g/255,b/255];rgb=rgb.map(v=>v>0.04045?Math.pow((v+0.055)/1.055,2.4):v/12.92);const X=rgb[0]*0.4124+rgb[1]*0.3576+rgb[2]*0.1805;const Y=rgb[0]*0.2126+rgb[1]*0.7152+rgb[2]*0.0722;const Z=rgb[0]*0.0193+rgb[1]*0.1192+rgb[2]*0.9505;const Xn=0.95047,Yn=1.00000,Zn=1.08883;const xyz=[X/Xn,Y/Yn,Z/Zn].map(v=>v>0.008856?Math.pow(v,1/3):7.787*v+16/116);const L=116*xyz[1]-16;const aValue=500*(xyz[0]-xyz[1]);const bValue=200*(xyz[1]-xyz[2]);const hueAngle=Math.atan2(bValue,aValue)*(180/Math.PI);let undertone='';if(hueAngle>60){undertone='Warm';}else if(hueAngle<60){undertone='Cool';}else{undertone='Neutral';}let lightness='';if(L>66){lightness='High';}else if(L>45){lightness='Medium';}else{lightness='Low';}let seasons=[];if(undertone==='Warm'){if(lightness==='High'){seasons=['Spring','Autumn'];}else{seasons=['Autumn'];}}else if(undertone==='Cool'){if(lightness==='High'){seasons=['Summer','Autumn','Winter'];}else{seasons=['Summer','Autumn'];}}else{if(lightness==='High'){seasons=['Spring','Summer','Autumn','Winter'];}else{seasons=['Summer','Autumn'];}}setAnalysis({undertone,lightness,seasons,labValues:{L:L.toFixed(1),a:aValue.toFixed(1),b:bValue.toFixed(1)}});setIsAnalyzing(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-2",children:"Skin Tone Analyzer"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-600",children:"Position your face in the center of the frame"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"relative mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("video",{ref:videoRef,autoPlay:true,playsInline:true,className:"w-full max-w-2xl border rounded transform scale-x-[-1]"// Mirror the video
}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("canvas",{ref:canvasRef,width:"640",height:"480",className:"hidden"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"absolute top-1/2 left-1/2 transform -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-[100px] h-[100px] border-2 border-white rounded-lg opacity-50"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:analyzeSkinTone,disabled:isAnalyzing,className:"bg-blue-500 hover:bg-blue-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded flex items-center gap-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Camera,{size:20}),isAnalyzing?'Analyzing...':'Analyze Skin Tone']}),analysis&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-4 p-4 border rounded",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"font-bold mb-2",children:"Analysis Results:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"space-y-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Undertone: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"font-medium",children:analysis.undertone})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Lightness: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"font-medium",children:analysis.lightness})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Lab Values: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"font-medium",children:["L*: ",analysis.labValues.L,", a*: ",analysis.labValues.a,", b*: ",analysis.labValues.b]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Recommended Seasons: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"font-medium",children:analysis.seasons.join(', ')})]})]})]})]});};export default SkinToneAnalyzer;
